description.narrative: Renforcement de la coordination nationale et regionale et le suivi de la mise en oeuvre du PNAN en lien avec l'engagement du pays envers le SUN

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Renforcement de la coordination nationale et regionale et le suivi de la mise en oeuvre du PNAN en lien avec l'engagement du pays envers le SUN

description.narrative: National nutrition investment analysis was initiated through a dedicated budget brief focusing on nutrition governance and nutrition specific interventions – results will be disseminated in 2020. Through its system strengthening actions for improved nutrition governance, UNICEF has supported decentralized coordination and enhanced civil society capacity reaching more than 380 non-governmental organization in 20 out of the 22 regions. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019

title.narrative: Number of review meetings of the Common Result Framework of the national nutrition plan PNAN III
# of coordination meetings at regional level (6 focus regions)
% allocation to Nutrition in the national budget
